name: Nine Realms (itch)
description:
I have taken the summer to begin experimenting with game design.

While I have created everything you see here I would really like to add more in the future once I acquire the proper skill sets. A pause menu and  sound effects would be awesome.

Some Bugs I know of that you might experience are:

The log you have to push sometimes gets stuck.

The controls are not intuitive.

jump is space or up, movement is was and arrow keys, attack is left shift.

If you play my game please let me know what you think in the comments. Please remember I am a complete newcomer to Game Design. This is my very first game.
